title: THOUGHT / SOBRIETY DAY ONE
description: Endurance -- about staying clean. Not an initiation dialogue, but UPON FIXING thought?

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "Do you know what today is?"
dialogueTree.english: Do you know what today is?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ці ведаеш ты, які сёння дзень?

links.title: You: "My birthday?"
links.english: My birthday?
links.polish: Moje urodziny?
links.belarusian: Мае дзень нараджэння?

links.title: Endurance: "No. Well, it might be, but you don'..."
links.english: No. Well, it might be, but you don't have your badge, so how would you know? Try again.
links.polish: Nie. No, może i tak, ale nie masz swojej odznaki, więc skąd możesz wiedzieć? Spróbuj jeszcze raz.
links.belarusian: Не. Ну, можа і так, але ў цябе няма свайго значка, дык адкуль ты можаш ведаць? Паспрабуй яшчэ раз.

Alternate1.english: No. Check your badge. Is it your birthday? No, it's not. Try again.
Alternate1.polish: Nie. Spójrz na odznakę. Masz dziś urodziny? Nie masz. Spróbuj jeszcze raz.
Alternate1.belarusian: Не. Паглядзі на знак. У цябе сёння дзень нараджэння? Не. Спробуй яшчэ раз.

links.title: You: "My wedding anniversary?"
links.english: My wedding anniversary?
links.polish: Moja rocznica ślubu?
links.belarusian: Маё юбілея вяселля?

links.title: Endurance: "No, believe it or not, this isn't a..."
links.english: No, believe it or not, this isn't about *her*. Well, not exactly...
links.polish: Nie. Wierz lub nie, ale nie chodzi tym razem *o nią*. No, nie tak do końca...
links.belarusian: Не. Веры ці не, але гэтым разам гаворка ідзе *не пра яе*. Ну, не зусім так...

links.title: You: "The day I'll solve this case?"
links.english: The day I'll solve this case?
links.polish: Dzień, w którym rozwiążę sprawę?
links.belarusian: Дзень, у які я вырашу справу?

links.title: Endurance: "Let's hope so. It's beginning to se..."
links.english: Let's hope so. It's beginning to seem possible that you *will* solve it.
links.polish: Miejmy nadzieję. Zaczyna wydawać się możliwe, że *faktycznie* ją rozwiążesz.
links.belarusian: Будзем спадзявацца. Пачынае здавацца магчымым, што *насамрэч* яе вырашыце.

links.title: You: "I give up."
links.english: I give up.
links.polish: Poddaję się.
links.belarusian: Я здаюся.

links.title: You: "(Lie.) Yes."
links.english: (Lie.) Yes.
links.polish: (Skłam). Tak.
links.belarusian: (Схлусіць). Так.

links.title: Endurance: "No, you don't. It's been too long s..."
links.english: No, you don't. It's been too long since this has happened for you to recognize the feeling.
links.polish: Nie, nie wiesz. Taki dzień miał miejsce zbyt dawno temu, żebyś rozpoznawał to uczucie.
links.belarusian: Не, ты не ведаеш. Такі дзень меў месца занадта даўно, каб ты распазнаваў гэтае адчуванне.

links.title: Endurance: "It's your first day sober."
links.english: It's your first day sober.
links.polish: To twój pierwszy dzień trzeźwości.
links.belarusian: Гэта твой першы дзень цвярозасці.

links.title: You: "What?! I've been sober for *over tw..."
links.english: What?! I've been sober for *over two days* already!
links.polish: Co?! Jestem trzeźwy już od *ponad dwóch dni*!
links.belarusian: Што?! Я цвярозы ўжо *больш за два дні*!

links.title: Endurance: "It takes a while for that shit to g..."
links.english: It takes a while for that shit to get out of your system, and for reality to come back into focus.
links.polish: Chwilę trwa, zanim ten syf wypłucze się z organizmu i odzyska się pełen kontakt z rzeczywistością.
links.belarusian: Падзець час, пакуль гэты бруд вымыецца з арганізма і адновіцца поўны кантакт з рэальнасцю.

links.title: You: "Reality... (Look around.)"
links.english: Reality... (Look around.)
links.polish: Rzeczywistość... (Rozejrzyj się).
links.belarusian: Рэчаіснасць... (Азірніся).

links.title: Endurance: "Yes, you're beginning to see the wo..."
links.english: Yes, you're beginning to see the world for what it is, even through the mental fog. And yourself, too -- what you've made yourself into.
links.polish: Tak, zaczynasz widzieć świat takim, jaki jest, mimo obecnej jeszcze mentalnej mgły. Dostrzegasz też siebie. To, w co sam siebie zmieniłeś.
links.belarusian: Так, ты пачынаеш бачыць свет такім, які ён ёсць, нягледзячы на сённяшні яшчэ ментальны туман. Ты бачыш і сябе. Тое, у што сам сябе змяніў.

links.title: You: "I don't know how I feel about this..."
links.english: I don't know how I feel about this yet...
links.polish: Nie wiem jeszcze, co o tym myśleć...
links.belarusian: Яшчэ не ведаю, што аб гэтым думаць...

links.title: Endurance: "You're going to feel all kinds of c..."
links.english: You're going to feel all kinds of contradictory, confusing things for months to come. But don't get discouraged -- you just have to keep going, right foot in front of left, left foot in front of right...
links.polish: Będziesz czuł przez najbliższe miesiące najróżniejsze sprzeczne i niejasne rzeczy. Ale nie zniechęcaj się. Musisz po prostu trzymać się dalej – czynić kolejne kroki naprzód, lewa, prawa, lewa, prawa...
links.belarusian: На працягу наступных месяцаў ты будзеш адчуваць самыя розныя супярэчлівыя і няясныя рэчы. Але не адчайвайся. Табе проста трэба рухацца далей — рабіць наступныя крокі наперад, левая, правая, левая, правая...

links.title: You: "I'm done with my old life. One foot..."
links.english: I'm done with my old life. One foot after the other, I will go on...
links.polish: Skończyłem ze swoim starym życiem. Krok po kroku będę parł naprzód...
links.belarusian: Я скончыў са сваім старым жыццём. Крок за крокам буду рухацца наперад...

links.title: Endurance: "...and together we will walk the wa..."
links.english: ...and together we will walk the waste land of reality. Because even if you haven't had your last drink or your last line, you will never really, truly enjoy either again.
links.polish: Razem przewędrujemy pustkowia rzeczywistości. Bo nawet jeśli to nie był twój ostatni drink czy kreska, już nigdy tak naprawdę nie przyniosą ci one radości.
links.belarusian: Разам прабрыдзем пусташамі рэальнасці. Бо нават калі гэта і не быў твой апошні напой ці палоска, яны ўжо ніколі сапраўды не прынясуць табе радасці.

links.title: You: "No, I can't handle this, I'm done...."
links.english: No, I can't handle this, I'm done. I'm going to find a drink *right now*. [Discard thought.]
links.polish: Nie, nie dam rady. To koniec. Idę się napić, *natychmiast*. [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: Не, не магу. Гэта канец. Іду піць, *неадкладна*. [Адкінь думку].

links.title: You: "Oh, how I've missed this clarity!"
links.english: Oh, how I've missed this clarity!
links.polish: Och, jakże tęskniłem za tą jasnością umysłu!
links.belarusian: Ох, як я сумаваў па гэтай яснасці розуму!

links.title: Endurance: "Don't get too excited. Clarity is s..."
links.english: Don't get too excited. Clarity is still many months away for you -- difficult, confusing, very emotional months. Shall we keep going?
links.polish: Nie ekscytuj się zbytnio. Od pełnej jasności umysłu dzieli cię jeszcze wiele miesięcy. Trudnych, dezorientujących, pełnych emocji. Trwamy w tym dalej?
links.belarusian: Не вельмі захапляйся. Ад поўнай яснасці розуму цябе аддзяляюць яшчэ шмат месяцаў. Складаныя, заблытаныя, поўныя эмоцый. Працягваем у гэтым далей?

links.title: You: "Everything is terrible. I want off..."
links.english: Everything is terrible. I want off the sobriety train.
links.polish: Wszystko jest przepaskudne. Nie chcę więcej tej trzeźwości.
links.belarusian: Усё жахліва. Я больш не хачу гэтай цвярозасці.

links.title: Endurance: "You've shown you can get through tw..."
links.english: You've shown you can get through two days of detox. You can certainly endure a little more...
links.polish: Pokazałeś, że jesteś w stanie przeżyć dwa dni detoksu. Na pewno wytrzymasz jeszcze trochę...
links.belarusian: Ты паказаў, што можаш вытрымаць два дні дэтоксу. Напэўна, яшчэ трохі вытрымаеш...

links.title: You: "How did I let it come to this? I ne..."
links.english: How did I let it come to this? I need to get my buzz on *immediately*.
links.polish: Jak ja do tego dopuściłem? Muszę *natychmiast* zaaplikować odpowiednią dawkę.
links.belarusian: Як я да гэтага дапусціў? Трэба *неадкладна* зааплікаваць адпаведную дозу.

links.title: Endurance: "No, you don't. You're well into det..."
links.english: No, you don't. You're well into detoxing now. *Reality* is beginning to come into focus -- just look around.
links.polish: Nie, nie musisz. Twój detoks już trochę trwa. Zaczynasz naprawdę odzyskiwać kontakt z *rzeczywistością*. Rozejrzyj się tylko.
links.belarusian: Не, не трэба. Твой дэтокс ужо трохі працягваецца. Ты пачынаеш сапраўды аднаўляць сувязь з *рэальнасцю*. Проста азірніся вакол.

links.title: You: "Reality... (Study your surroundings..."
links.english: Reality... (Study your surroundings with your newly sober eyes.)
links.polish: Rzeczywistość... (Przyjrzyj się okolicy swoim nowym, trzeźwym spojrzeniem).
links.belarusian: Рэчаіснасць... (Уважліва паглядзіце на ваколіцы сваім новым, цвярозым поглядам).

links.title: You: "Huh?"
links.english: Huh?
links.polish: Hm?
links.belarusian: Гм?

links.title: Endurance: "Of course. It's been too long since..."
links.english: Of course. It's been too long since this has happened for you to recognize the feeling.
links.polish: No tak. Taki dzień miał miejsce zbyt dawno temu, żebyś rozpoznawał to uczucie.
links.belarusian: Ну вось. Такі дзень адбыўся даўно, каб ты распазнаў гэтае адчуванне.
